actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require federally related health care facilities to test infants for certain diseases.

summary.text: Requires federally related health care facilities to test infants born in the facility or brought to it for health care for specified diseases. Defines a "federally related health care facility" for the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to require federally related health care facilities to test infants for certain diseases.
